title: Sweet Potato Cookies
directions: In a food processor, combine all the ingredients until smooth.
The dough will be pretty sticky.
Add the chocolate chips and pulse a few times to get them mixed in well.
Using a cookie scoop, drop cookies onto a lined baking sheet.
Let the cookies cool before transferring them to a container. These should last a couple weeks in the fridge. You may also be able to freeze them. Enjoy!
